name: Solenars Edge
description: The original Solenars Edge in all it's video game/anime song glory. It was revised and edited several times and put on Steam as Solenars Edge Rebirth, but what happens when I was allowed to do just about anything without fear of copyright infringement? Welcome to the original Solenars Edge, see the characters and music as they were originally designed and presented. Compare past and new as you re-embark on a quest to save the world of Alcornagia once again.
